T02TD2253E:159b-2: yi ge h'um la sogs pa las byung ba'i dgyes pa'i rdo rje la sogs pa'i gzugs so //
T02TD2253E:159b-3: phyag rgya'i de nyid ces bya ba ni grangs bgrangs pa'i rim pas de nyid sems sbyangs pa tsam mo ;
T02TD2253E:159b-4: / nges pa'i don gyis las kyi phyag rgya las so //
T02TD2253E:159b-5: bdag gis de nyid ni 'gro ba sna tshogs sems ngo bo med pa'i rang bzhin no //
T02TD2253E:159b-6: chos kyi de nyid ni chos rnams ma skyes pa'o //
T02TD2253E:159b-7: lha'i da nyid ces bya ba ni bdag gi de nyid dang /
T02TD2253E:159b-8: chos kyi de nyid dag de'i bdag nyid du byas pas tha mi dad ces bya ba'i bar du'o //
T02TD2253E:159b-9: de nyid lnga po de dag ni /
T02TD2253E:159b-10: bla ma'i man ngag gis phyag rgya bzhi dang sbyar bar bya'o //
T02TD2253E:159b-11: rim pa lnga yang rim pa bzhin du'o //
T02TD2253E:159b-13: bskyed pa yi ni rim pa dang //
T02TD2253E:159b-14: rdzogs pa yi ni rim pa nyid //
T02TD2253E:159b-15: rim pa gnyis la brten nas ni //
T02TD2253E:159b-16: rdo rje can gyis chos 'chad do //
T02TD2253E:159b-17: zhes bya ba ni rgyud kyi tshig yin no //
T02TD2253E:159b-18: rim pa ltar bstan pa ji lta bu zhe na //
T02TD2253E:159b-20: bskyed pa'i rim par yang mdor bsdus pa'i rim pa dang rdo rje bzlas pa'o //
T02TD2253E:159b-21: ming gzhan phyi bskyed pa'i rim pa dang //
T02TD2253E:159b-22: nang gi bskyed pa'i rim pa zhes bya'o //
T02TD2253E:159b-23: rdzogs par yang bdag byin gyis brlabs dang /
T02TD2253E:159b-24: mngon par byang chub pa dang /
T02TD2253E:159b-28: ngo bo nyid kyi rim pa zhes bya ba bstan pa yin no //
T02TD2253E:159b-29: de nyid phyag rgya bzhi'i yang dag pa'i ngo bo'i rang bzhin te /
T02TD2253E:159b-30: thams cad gsang ba'i rgyud las bstan par shes par bya'o //
T02TD2253E:159b-32: phyag rgya chen po yid kyis te //
T02TD2253E:159b-33: dam tshig phyag rgya kun du 'gro //
T02TD2253E:159b-34: chos kyi phyag rgya ngag las te //
T02TD2253E:159b-35: las kyi phyag rgya lus kyi'o //
T02TD2253E:159b-37: da ni las kyi phyag rgya gang las de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbugs dbyung ba dang /
T02TD2253E:159b-38: rdo rje 'chang gi dbugs dbyung ba nyid shes pas tshim ba dag dgag pa'i phyir /
T02TD2253E:159b-39: phyag rgya chen po mi shes par //
T02TD2253E:159b-40: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras te //
T02TD2253E:159b-41: bla ma gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i gzhung lugs kyi de nyid gang yin pa de la nye bar snang bas /
T02TD2253E:160a-2: chos kyi phyag rgya la sogs pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos la skur ba 'debs pa'i rnal 'byor pa ni du 'bod du 'gro'o //
T02TD2253E:160a-3: du 'bod ces bya ba ni mtshon pa ste //
T02TD2253E:160a-4: gzhan mnar med pa'i dmyal ba la sogs pa'i yang gzung ngo //
T02TD2253E:160a-5: du 'bod la sogs pa dmyal bar 'gro ba dang /
T02TD2253E:160a-6: dam pa'i chos spang bsgrub pa ni //
T02TD2253E:160a-7: 'phags pa brgyad stong pa la sogs pa'i mdo las gsal bas rgyas par ma bstan to //
T02TD2253E:160a-8: 'on te las kyi phyag rgya de kho na de nyid du mi 'gyur ba ji ltar zhe na /
T02TD2253E:160a-9: las kyi phyag rgya khro rgyu can /
T02TD2253E:160a-10: sdig can shin tu 'jigs rung ba //
T02TD2253E:160a-11: shin tu ring du spang bar bya //
T02TD2253E:160a-14: mi mo nyams 'gyur shes pa ni //
T02TD2253E:160a-15: de yi bde ba 'ang nyams par 'gyur //
T02TD2253E:160a-16: zhes bya ba la sogs pa rgyud kyi tshig gis so //
T02TD2253E:160a-17: mchog tu dga' ba ma mthong bar //
T02TD2253E:160a-18: bud med bde ba snyam du sems //
T02TD2253E:160a-20: ji ltar me long du snang ba'i bzhin gyi gzugs brnyan la /
T02TD2253E:160a-22: sngon du yang ma grub la /
T02TD2253E:160a-23: da ltar grub pa yang med pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2253E:160a-24: gzhan gyi gzugs brnyan gyi 'dra ba tsam 'byung ba yin no //
T02TD2253E:160a-25: de ltar na yang 'jig rten ba ni bdag gi bzhin mthong zhes 'khrul pas byas pa'i dga' ba skye bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2253E:160a-26: de bzhin du slob dpon blo dman pa dag kyang /
T02TD2253E:160a-27: shes rab ye shes bsgrubs nas lhan cig skyes pa nyams su myong ngo zhe na /
T02TD2253E:160a-28: yang dag par dga' ba skye bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2253E:160a-29: dga' ba skye bar 'gyur kyang chos kyi phyag rgya'i gtam yang mi shes so zhes bya ba la sogs pa phyag rgya bzhi'i rjes su bstan pa las slob dpon klu sgrub kyis gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD2253E:160a-30: ye shes grub pa las kyang //
T02TD2253E:160a-31: dbang po gnyis byung bde ba ni //
T02TD2253E:160a-32: de nyid yin zhes skye ngan smra'i //
T02TD2253E:160a-33: de ni bde ba che yin zhes //
T02TD2253E:160a-34: rgyal ba mchog gis ma gsungs so //
T02TD2253E:160a-35: zhes bya ba'i tshig gis bstan pa yin no //
T02TD2253E:160a-36: 'on te de ltar rgyud du ma nas gsungs pa'i las kyi phyag rgya la smad pas /
T02TD2253E:160a-37: khyod ni dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur ba dang phrad pa yin no zhe na ma yin te /
T02TD2253E:160b-0: de de kho na nyid kyi gtso bor ma yin par lung las @160b gsungs pas bkag pa yin no //
T02TD2253E:160b-2: las kyi phyag rgya la brten nas //
T02TD2253E:160b-3: zhes bya ba la sogs pas byed rgyu'i ngo bo nyid du bstan pa'i phyir smras pa yin na /
T02TD2253E:160b-4: de la skur btab pa ga la yin zhes 'dir mang du brjod mi dgos so //
T02TD2253E:160b-6: phyag rgya rnams rtogs par bya ba dang /
T02TD2253E:160b-7: rang gi 'dod pa'i lha'i mthu bstan pa'i phyir //
T02TD2253E:160b-8: de srid phyag rgya bzhi dang ni //
T02TD2253E:160b-9: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras te /
T02TD2253E:160b-10: ri khrod pa ni snying po can te /
T02TD2253E:160b-11: dpal ri khrod pa'i zhabs kyi dngos grub thob pa'o// lhag ma ni go sla'o //
T02TD2253E:160b-12: da ni bsod nams yongs su bsngo bas mjug bsdu ba'i phyir /
T02TD2253E:160b-13: yang dag dbang bskur cho ga yis //
T02TD2253E:160b-14: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras te go sla'o / dpal ldan ri khrod dbang phyug bcom ldan gang yin de yis mngon sum rjes bzung ba //
T02TD2253E:160b-15: bla med chos nyid rin chen bdud rtsi chen po'i 'byung gnas zab mo nyid la ni //
T02TD2253E:160b-16: gal te bems po rmongs pas de dag rmongs par byed la kho bo ci byar yod //
T02TD2253E:160b-17: bdag 'dra bstod pa rtsom par byed pa ngo mtshar brtse ba'i phyir //
T02TD2253E:160b-18: dbang bskur bzang dang ngan pa'i rim dang drag po'i rim dka' ba //
T02TD2253E:160b-19: mgon pos gsungs pa de bzhin blo chung rnams kyi yul min ngo mtshar che //
T02TD2253E:160b-20: de yi rjes su gnang ba bsgom pas de yis rnam par dpyad pa dag / nus pa ji bzhin slo yis gsung rab dran nas brjod par byas //
T02TD2253E:160b-21: dbang gi nges par gyur pa zab mo gya mtsho yi //
T02TD2253E:160b-22: 'grel pa gsal po 'di ni byas pa las /
T02TD2253E:160b-23: bdag gis dge ba skad cig bsags pa des //
T02TD2253E:160b-24: skye bo ma lus pa dag rgyal gyur cig / bzhi pa'i rim la rmongs pa yis //
T02TD2253E:160b-25: dpung gi tshogs gang 'jig byed pa //
T02TD2253E:160b-27: dga' ba'i dpal ldan mgon pos bris //
T02TD2253E:160b-28: dbang bskur ba nges par bstan pa'i dka' 'grel ;
T02TD2253E:160b-29: slob dpon dga' ba skyong gis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
